name: Dazzling Display, Mythic

sections.body: While wielding the weapon with which you have Weapon Focus, you can use Dazzling Display as a standard action with a –5 penalty on your Intimidate check, as a move action with a –10 penalty, or as a swift action with a –20 penalty. You can expend one use of mythic power when you make a Dazzling Display to make those affected by the display frightened rather than shaken.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You can quickly deter others with your martial mastery.
